channel.title: Anyone play on XBC?
channel.description: Anyone here play on [glow=green,2,300]XBC[/glow]? [sub][i]not live[/i][/sub](XBC - Xbox Connect, its basically like free xbox live, it just uses system link) If its ok I can post a link to the website, otherwise, just google xbc.

item.title: Anyone play on XBC?
item.dc:creator: @Polaris Polaris
item.description:
@Polaris wrote:

Mainpage - http://www.xbconnect.com/
Download - http://www.xbconnect.com/downloads/XBCINST518.exe
If alot of people are having problems installing/connecting to it, ill post a tut.

[glow=green,2,300]Again, XBC is completly free.[/glow]
All you need is an ethernet cord, Modem with 2 or more ethernet slots (Or an extra NIC card in your pc) and fast internet.

It also doesnt matter if you have a Xbox 360, it should work for that too. XBC has mostly Halo2/Halo players, but it does have some farcry players and other games.

Read full topic
